"Class II Gaming" means class II gaming as defined by 25 U.S.C. §2703(7), i
"Class III Gaming" means class III gaming as defined by U.S.C. §2703(8).

"Inventory Checker" means a designated person from the accounting office wh

"Reservation" means all lands within the exterior boundaries of the Bad Riv
"Tribe" means the Bad River Band of the Lake Superior Chippewa Indians.
